group1.title: Continuous Support
group1.summary: I will advance your web-based software to keep it efficient and competitive on the market. Using well-established DevOps processes, I help roll out urgent updates within hours and release new, planned functional modules every other week.

group2.title: Back-end Development
group2.summary: I accurately implement the business logic of your web app on the back end. I rely on proven frameworks to ensure fast and quality coding, building well-structured APIs to integrate your web app with corporate or third-party systems.

group3.title: Frontend Design/Dev
group3.summary: As a web expert, I closely analyze the user audience to understand their needs and reflect these findings in UI design. After aligning on the look and feel with stakeholders, I bring it to life with smart front-end technologies.
